name: Natural Disaster
description: Earthquake, tornado, wildfire, or severe flooding strikes the kingdom.
location: a random worksite and 2 adjacent hexes (roll 1d6)

criticalSuccess.msg: Minimal damage; citizens impressed by response, -{unrest} unrest

success.msg: Some damage; lose 1 Resource from this hex

failure.msg: Major damage; lose all production from the hex this turn, +{unrest} unrest

criticalFailure.msg: Devastating losses. Any worksites are removed from the hex, +{unrest} unrest

modifiers.name: Devastating losses. Any worksites are removed from the hex

ifUnresolved.name: Natural Disaster Aftermath
ifUnresolved.description: The natural disaster has left widespread devastation requiring ongoing recovery efforts

onSuccess.msg: The natural disaster aftermath situation has been resolved!

onFailure.msg: Failed to resolve the natural disaster aftermath situation
